name: Hull Breach (itch)
description:
Hull Breach is a 2D arcade shooter with an underwater setting with an unique pixel-art style. The game features four different kinds of enemies and three playable ships, each with an unique special ability and different manoeuvrability and damage potential. Survive as long as possible while fighting off hordes of enemies.

Gameplay:

You have little time to dodge enemies once they're in range. Have an eye on the radar to notice incoming enemies in time. You can move pretty fast in forward direction but only slow in other directions, so point to the direction you want to move.
There are also some special abilities that will help you to survive: guided missiles, mines and shields.

Controls:
Keyboard or Mouse+Keyboard

This game is open source and was made using Godot. See GitHub for source code.
